mapper.select: SELECT study_idx, study_subject, study_intro, study_type, study_time, study_num_of_people, study_contact_type, study_space, study_date, study_readcount, study_status FROM study ORDER BY study_readcount DESC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT s.study_idx, s.study_subject, s.study_intro, s.study_type, s.study_time, s.study_num_of_people, s.study_contact_type, s.study_space, s.study_date, s.study_readcount, s.study_status FROM study s, mem_study_type mst WHERE study_type IN (mst.study_type1, mst.study_type2, mst.study_type3) AND mst.member_id = #{member_id} LIMIT 0,5
